entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Light snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
